reviewText: Being a model railroader I especially enjoy this series
Love these shows, always just enough that focuses on the subject
If you have any interest in railroads past and present this series is well worth watching!
I love learning about trains and this is one of my favorite series about them. Jam-packed with useful and interesting information. Loved it!

I have been into model railroading since 1946. I'm also interested in how railroads operate in other countries. My interest came from hanging around down by the Milwaukee Road tracks where they passed under Vliet Street in Milwaukee WI. Besides having tips one can use in his/her train hobby these videos provide insight as to how and where real railroads operate. I watched this on my Amazon prime account.

I choose this rating because I am a model train collector and enjoy seeing what kinds of layouts there are throughout the world.
I also enjoy viewing different tourist railroads.
Nice blend of live and model railroading.  The film has a good number of short vignettes which keeps the interest high.
